column4: Yay, I'm back with useless questions.  So, again, in windows, I can get a fairly good signal from my AP from my room.  In ubuntu, I walk 10 feet away from the router, signal dies
I'm running an atheros card, all of #madwifi appears to be asleep
what do you get when you type "lspci | grep -i net" into terminal?
can you repeat the command I need to run?
